name: Lace Stocking Gift Card Holder
description: This is a simple lace edged mini-sock pattern. The finished item is the perfect size for a gift card or small treat, and would also make an adorable ornament or gift decoration.
category: Containers Decorative → Hanging Ornament Decorative → Christmas Stocking
full_text: This is a simple lace edged mini-sock pattern. The finished item is the perfect size for a gift card or small treat, and would also make an adorable ornament or gift decoration. Please feel free to use any KWDreamer Designs pattern to make items to sell or donate (as well as items for your personal use). We only request that you credit KWDreamer Designs as the original creator: http://www.ravelry.com/patterns/sources/kwdreamer-designs... .
